title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Part 5)
description: Alice attends a tea party unlike any she's ever been to previously. The attendants include a Mad Hatter, a March Hare, and a Dormouse. The tea party is filled with nonsensical riddles and constant seat-changing. After being insulted numerous times, Alice can no longer take it and leaves in a huff.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
comprehension: Similes and Metaphors                : Identify and understand similes and metaphors
